attributes.action: Bring more IT jobs to Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been trying to find a job in IT (Information technology) for over a year.

I cannot drive and I cannot afford to learn to drive because I don't have a job.

There for I cannot travel outside Manchester to work.

IT needs to be big in Manchester.
After all this is where Alan Turing made his famous computers.
